welcome.paragraph1: Think of this as your friendly guide to the exciting world of technology. We'll dive into making cool projects with code, learn how to keep computers safe from online threats (cybersecurity), and especially how to build things in the cloud (cloud computing). For cloud computing, we'll focus on Microsoft Azure, learning how to set up small online projects and infrastructure.
welcome.paragraph2: We'll use special tools like ARM templates, Terraform, and Bicep to help us build and manage things easily, and we'll also figure out the basics of how networks connect in the cloud. Plus, we'll cover everyday systems like Linux and of course, Windows. I'll be sharing what I learn and build, and I'd love to hear your thoughts too! Jump in, look around, and let's explore this amazing tech journey together.

cv.pageDescription: Learn more about Jonathan Rodriguez, a passionate developer and cloud engineer
cv.name: Jonathan Rodriguez
cv.title: Software Engineer
cv.summary: A Software Engineer specializing in developing high-performance, scalable projects using DevOps tools. I have extensive experience building web applications and DevOps pipelines.

work.title: DevOps Engineer
work.description: Developing and maintaining backend pipelines for a high-performance, scalable and secure deployments.
achievements: Engineer scalable pipelines for Java Spring Boot deployments.
Implement security DevOps practices and compliance with industry standards.
Manage infrastructure as code using Terraform and CloudFormation.
Build python scripts for automation tasks and security monitoring.
Monitor infrastructure health and performance using Grafana and OpenSearch.

work.title: Azure Support Engineer
work.description: Provided technical support and troubleshooting for Azure cloud services, including virtual machines, Azure Batch, storage, networking, and security.
achievements: Debugged and resolved complex issues related to Azure infrastructure and services.
Provided guidance and recommendations for optimizing Azure ARM templates, security RBAC, and Azure Policy.
Troubleshooting Azure deployments through CLI and PowerShell using remote access.
Replicating deployments with ARM templates, Terraform, Bicep and Azure DevOps.

work.title: Back Office
work.description: Developed solutions automation process using Microsoft Power Automate and improve efficiency.
achievements: Built custom Power Automate flow to automate data extraction and transformation.
Implemented CRM integration using Power Automate to enhance customer engagement.
Manual task automation using Power Automate to streamline processes and reduce manual errors.

work.title: Technical Support Specialist
work.description: Provided exceptional customer support, resolving complex technical issues and providing timely solutions.
achievements: Provided customer service support with troubleshooting skills.
Built customer relationships through communication and problem-solving.
